displayName.english: I got through the entire "how to" tutorial!  WooHoo!

description.english: This achievement requires you simply completing the 'How to" tutorial.

displayName.english: I not only completed the tutorial, but I'm a real Pog Champ because I finished it in under five minutes!!  Yay me!!

description.english: This achievement requires you completing the tutorial in under five minutes.

displayName.english: I umm, I am a pretty typical six inches long!  Good job Eva!  Good job us!

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 6 inches in the game.

displayName.english: I am now a proud eight inches long!  *smiles with confidence*

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 8 inches in the game.

displayName.english: I feel so BIG now that I'm a mighty 10 inches in length.  ..Don't be jelly now!

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 10 inches in the game.

displayName.english: 12 inches!!  How cow!  Eat more apples guys!  It works!!  ..I am living proof!!

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 12 inches in the game.

displayName.english: "Two feet of virtual loving hot and sexy bliss!"  - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 24 inches in the game.

displayName.english: "Three feet of goddess like shimmering beauty!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 36 inches in the game.

displayName.english: "Four feet is not short when you started at just three inches!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 48 inches in the game.

displayName.english: "Five feet of slender snake is much more work than your 'to your ass" long hair there human!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 60 inches in the game.

displayName.english: "Six feet is 72 inches of beauty but holy hell is this a nightmare to care for!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to get Eva to get to a length of 72 inches in the game.

displayName.english: "I just bounced off a wall and smashed two big blocks!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to bust two blocks on a single wall bounce.

displayName.english: "I skillfully reflected off that wall there and then Bam! Blap! Pow! Three big bad blocks dead!  Bwah! ha! ha! ha!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to bust three blocks on a single wall bounce.

displayName.english: *FLEXES*  "It ain't easy being a little snake, but when you got skills like me.. I just smashed FOUR blocks with a single wall bounce!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to bust four (or more) blocks on a single wall bounce.

displayName.english: "I survived for a full 60 seconds in that virtual entropy nightmare!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to last at least one minute in a single game.

displayName.english: "Surviving two full minutes in this madhouse is not easy, but I did it!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to last at least two minutes in a single game.

displayName.english: "Three minutes of starving, dodging crazed rectangles and just surviving those maniacs!  Whew!  I'm a real champion, I tell ya!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to last at least three minutes in a single game.

displayName.english: "Lasting four minutes in that death dungeon is nothing short of a miracle!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to last at least four minutes in a single game.

displayName.english: "Five minutes in this ridiuclously overly difficult insanity that some dude named 'ZaxtorGameS' created.. I deserve some kind of award I tell ya!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to last at least five minutes in a single game.

displayName.english: "WOOO HOOOO!!  Nothing short of a true god-like gamer helped me survive ten full minutes of utter madness!!" - Eva.

description.english: This achievement requires you to last at least TEN MINUTES in a single game.

displayName.english: Under so much pressure, lasting a whole minute on average takes massive GOAT skills!

description.english: This achievement requires you having 100+ games played in your stats as well as your average game lasting one minute or longer.

displayName.english: YAY!  I've finally made my MILLION!!  ..*whispers: in B_EvaSive*

description.english: This achievement requires you surpassing one million total points in all of your games per the game stats.

displayName.english: I am a MULTI-MILLIONAIRE baby!! .. I've give you this five million for your blue suade shoes!

description.english: This achievement requires you surpassing five million total points in all of your games per the game stats.

displayName.english: The definition of addiction is a video game where you average a few thousand points per game and total ten million points!

description.english: This achievement requires you surpassing ten million total points in all of your games per the game stats.

displayName.english: WooHoo!  I just earned myself a FREE Steam game via ZaxtorGameS! .. (See Forums)

description.english: This achievement requires you surpassing 25 million total points in all of your games per the game stats.

displayName.english: My aunt Helga used to have a really 'bouncy' personality, but she has nothing on me!

description.english: This achievement requires you to bounce off the walls 100 or more times in a single game.

displayName.english: The crazy block gave me a dirty look and then POW!.. Right off the wall I went and he regretted it!

description.english: This achievement requires you to destroy 25 or more blocks with bounces off the walls, otherwise called 'bounce kills'.
